results.message: Enrichment 1: technique 'frame_control' evidence not found in transcript: "Your voice is very soft (reframing her comment about having a cold)..."
Enrichment 2: technique 'screening' evidence not found in transcript: "What are you doing here? Are you new here?..."
Seg 42: language_confusion — ASR produced 'Nagyaros' - likely a mangled transcription of a Hungarian profession word
Seg 0: nonsense — Multiple turns compressed into one segment - missing clear sentence boundaries and interlocutor turns
Seg 1: nonsense — Multiple turns compressed into one segment - her name and responses are missing from what was clearly a back-and-forth exchange
Seg 2: nonsense — Multiple questions merged - 'what are you doing here yeah you enjoying it must be are you new here' is several turns collapsed
